question: Who has been appointed as the new Managing Director of the Life Insurance Corporation (LIC) of India?
explanation:
The Appointments Committee of the Cabinet (ACC) has approved the appointment of Siddhartha Mohanty as the new Managing Director of the Life Insurance Corporation (LIC) of India.
He is currently serving as the Managing director (MD) and chief executive officer (CEO) of LIC Housing Finance. Siddhartha Mohanty has replaced TC Suseel Kumar, who retired on January 31, 2021. LIC has four Managing Directors and one Chairman.
